content:
As thanks for your time in this bubble world,
Time shall synchronize with where you came from,
Reaching equilibrium with you.

Live well here!
We'll meet again someday...

Because you cleared away the Void Foam that was destroying life's vitality,
The World Bubble could regain its balance,
And we could meet here, in the Heart of Luca.

Thank you for clearing away the Remnant Mist,
Now I can
Finally be free~

So really,
thank you so much~<color=#ca8f50>{me}</color>!

I'm delighted
to meet you again!
The name I was given is <color=#d3b037>Oumuamua</color>.

Hey~
I knew you'd sense me.

This isn't your first time here~
I saw you earlier,
when you were sleeping.

Thank you for clearing away the Mist,
Now I can
Finally be free~

When you're ready to leave,
Click the little door in the bottom right corner.
That's your way back!

When you wake up,
A new day will begin.
